A.val: Creates a gush of water from the tip of the spell caster’s wand
The Unforgivable Curse, kills your opponent
Makes birds fly out of the end of your wand

B.val: Causes a small, locally contained explosion

C.val: Closes a door and binds it so that it can’t be opened
The Blasting Curse; Causes the item targeted to explode
Confounds your target, or makes them temporarily confused
Damages the eyesight of your opponent, making them seem to have pink eye
The Second Unforgivable Curse, the Cruciatus Curse; Tortures your opponent mercilessly

D.val: Erases the last spell cast by a wand so that it can’t be discovered
Makes teeth grow out of control
Makes seams split open, severs an object into two pieces
Opens a specific passageway into a cellar, may be useful in other instances; may be only a password

E.val: Makes an item larger, as in swollen
Causes an item to immediately dissolve away, as if it had never existed
Disarms the target of the spell, such as knocking their wand out of their hand

F.val: Binds a broken limb with a splint and bandages, tightly wrapped
Allows a secret to be hidden within the secret keeper’s soul; very powerful spell
Allows the user to write or draw in the air with fire
Also knows as the Knockback Jinx, pushes or flips something backwards
Causes a person to break out in boils

G.val: Creates a duplicate of an item (a twin, as in the zodiacal sign Gemini)

H.val: Man-Shape; makes a werewolf or person disguised as an animal resume their human shape

I.val: Puts up an impediment that slows down something or someone that is coming toward you
The third unforgivable curse.  Allows the user to assume complete control of another person
Conjures up ropes, which then bind an opponent

L.val: Allows the user to gain access to another’s mind and memories
Turns your opponent upside down and dangles them in thin air
"Liberates", or frees a body that has been caught up by the levicorpus spell
The Leg-Locker Curse; locks an opponent’s legs together
Creates light, usually by making the tip of the wand glow.  More light can be created using "lumos maxima"

M.val: Used to move a tree from one place to another
Used to move a body from one place to another
Used to summon the Dark Mark
Causes a buzzing noise to surround a limited area so that those in the area can carry on a private conversation

N.val: Extinguishes light, used to douse the light created by “Lumos”

O.val: Makes a person "oblivious", erasing their memories of an event
Conjures a bunch of flowers from the user’s wand

P.val: Total petrification; petrifies an opponent totally
The Four Point Spell; makes the user’s wand act like a compass
Turns any item into a Portkey, which can then be used to transport a person or persons to another location.
Reveals to you the last spell that a wand was used to cast
Protects the user, and sends a spell back on an opponent

Q.val: Makes things quiet, used to muffle "Sonorus"

R.val: Releases something from being constrained or held
Means to energize or wake up
Makes an area invisible to Muggles
Causes something that is hidden to be revealed
Causes a person to curl up in laughter, as if being tickled
Makes a boggart assume a “ridiculous” form, thereby making it funny instead of terrifying

S.val: Strengthen other protective spells, or to deflect any hexes cast toward a specific location
Used to clean dirt or other material off of a surface
Causes lacerations to appear all over an opponent’s body, as if they had been cut by an invisible sword
Makes the target of the spell unable to make any sound
Stupefies an opponent, or knocks them insensible temporarily

T.val: Forces an opponent’s legs to dance uncontrollably

W.val: Removes a stuck object, as in a wad of gum that is stuck in a keyhole
Allows the user to make an object levitate; the first spell taught in the Harry Potter movies
